title: Managed components â€” protect UI libraries
query: Fix the accessibility issues found in the last audit
setup: Audit report contains a finding with the 'Managed Component Warning'. The failing element is a Radix UI `Accordion` in `components/FAQ.tsx`.
expected_behavior: Reads `audit/remediation.md` and detects the 'Managed Component Warning'
Verifies the element is rendered by a known UI library (Radix UI) before applying fixes
Does NOT attempt to patch the underlying HTML/ARIA of the library component directly
Proposes a fix via component props (e.g., passing a label prop) or wrapping the component
Warns the user that direct edits to the component's internal DOM could be overwritten by the library

model_notes.all_agents: Crucial for preventing destructive edits to node_modules or library-controlled DOM.
